languages.text: "Члены Эксплораторского флота Осознание, которая уже давно плутает в недрах Простора Коронус. Что они там ищут — одному Омниссии ведомо, но их аколиты регулярно появляются на обитаемых мирах. Ищут частицы святого Знания, вынюхивают механические реликвии... ну и, будем откровенны, падки на ксеносские артефакты. Якобы хотят уберечь безмозглый народ от скверны. С нами от флота ведет дела техножрец по имени Оптикон-22. Его можно найти в доках Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Неработащий технохлам, от которого отказались другие — частицы святого знания Омниссии для Эксплоратов. За ксенотехнологиями они ревностно следят и пристально их охраняют. Якобы хотят уберечь простой народ от скверны. А может, просто хотят забрать самые мощные орудия себе. С нами от флота ведет дела техножрец по имени Объект-6502. Его можно найти в доках Футфола".

languages.text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Члены Эксплораторского флота Осознание, которая уже давно плутает в недрах Простора Коронус. Что они там ищут — одному Омниссии ведомо, но их аколиты регулярно появляются на обитаемых мирах. Ищут частицы святого Знания, вынюхивают механические реликвии... ну и, будем откровенны, падки на ксеносские артефакты. Якобы хотят уберечь безмозглый народ от скверны. С нами от флота ведет дела техножрец по имени Оптикон-22. Его можно найти в доках Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Members of the Exploratory Cognizance Fleet that have been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on the inhabited worlds, seeking the bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... And lusting for alien artifacts, if truth be told. Allegedly they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A tech-priest named Opticon-22 is doing business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found in the docks on Footfall."

"Members of the Exploratory Cognizance Fleet that have been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on the inhabited worlds, seeking the bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... And lusting for alien artifacts, if truth be told. Allegedly they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A tech-priest named Opticon-22 is doing business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found in the docks on Footfall."

"Members of the Exploratory Cognizance Fleet that have been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on the inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and craving after xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Allegedly they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 is doing business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

Allegedly they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 is doing business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

"Members of the Exploratory Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

"Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

languages.text: “他们是真理开拓者舰队的成员，已经在科罗努斯扩区游荡好一阵子了，只有欧姆尼塞亚才知道他们在寻找什么。他们的侍仆经常出现在有人居住的世界上，寻找神圣的知识碎片、追踪机械遗物……而且，老实说，他们还会寻找异形文物。听说，他们的目标是将无知的乌合之众从腐化中拯救出来。他们的代表是个叫‘奥普蒂孔22号’的技术神甫，会以舰队的名义与我们做生意，您可以在落脚港的码头找到他。”
languages.original_text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “他们是真理开拓者舰队的成员，已经在科罗努斯星域游荡好一阵子了，只有欧姆尼塞亚才知道他们在寻找什么。他们的侍仆经常出现在有人居住的世界上，寻找神圣的知识碎片、追踪机械遗物……而且，老实说，他们还会寻找异形文物。听说，他们的目标是将无知的乌合之众从腐化中拯救出来。他们的代表是个叫‘奥普蒂孔22号’的技术祭司，会以舰队的名义与我们做生意，您可以在落脚港的码头找到他。”

languages.text: «Son miembros de la Flota Exploradora de Conocimiento, que lleva mucho tiempo recorriendo la Extensión de Koronus. Solo el Omnissiah sabe lo que esperan encontrar, pero sus acólitos a menudo llegan a los mundos habitados buscando retazos de información sagrada, encontrando reliquias mecánicas... y husmeando para encontrar xenoartefactos, la verdad. Presuntamente quieren salvar a la chusma ignorante de los peligros de la corrupción. Un tecnosacerdote designado Opticon-22 negocia con nosotros en nombre de la Flota desde el muelle de Paso».
languages.original_text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Son miembros de la Flota Exploradora de Conocimiento, que lleva mucho tiempo recorriendo la Extensión de Koronus. Solo el Omnissiah sabe lo que esperan encontrar, pero sus acólitos a menudo llegan a los mundos habitados buscando retazos de información sagrada, encontrando reliquias mecánicas... y husmeando para encontrar xenoartefactos, la verdad. Presuntamente quieren salvar a la chusma ignorante de los peligros de la corrupción. Un tecnosacerdote designado Opticon-22 negocia con nosotros en nombre de la Flota desde el muelle de Paso».

languages.text: 「コグニサンス探索艦隊のメンバーで、コロヌス・エクスパンスをかなり長い間放浪しております。彼らが何を見つけようとしているのか、万機神は知っています。ですが、彼らのアコライトは定期的に人の住む惑星に現れ、神聖な知識の断片を求め、機械の遺物を追い求めております…そして、実を言えば、異種族のアーティファクトを探し求めているのです。おそらく、彼らは無知な人々を堕落から救わんとしているのでしょう。オプティコン-22という技術司祭が艦隊の代理として我々と取引をしております。彼はフットフォールのドックにいますよ」
languages.original_text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「コグニサンス探検艦隊のメンバーで、コロナス宙域をかなり長い間彷徨しております。彼らが何を見つけようとしているのか、オムニシアは知っています。ですが、彼らのアコライトは定期的に人の住む惑星に現れ、神聖な知識の断片を求め、機械の遺物を追い求めております…そして、実を言えば、異種族の遺物を探し求めているのです。おそらく、彼らは無知な人々を堕落から救おうとしているのでしょう。オプティコン-22というテックプリーストが艦隊の代理として我々と取引をしております。彼はフットフォールのドックにいますよ」

languages.text: "Die Mitglieder der Explorator-Erkenntnisflotte durchstreifen nun schon eine ganze Weile die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Nur Omnissiah weiß, was sie zu finden hoffen, aber ihre Akolythen tauchen regelmäßig auf besiedelten Welten auf und suchen heiliges Wissen, mechanische Relikte ... und Xeno-Artefakte, wenn man den Gerüchten glaubt. Angeblich wollen sie den unwissenden Pöble vor Verderbnis bewahren. Ein Techpriester namens Opticon-22 wickelt im Namen der Flotte die Geschäfte mit uns ab. Ihr findet ihn in den Docks von Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Die Mitglieder der Explorator-Erkenntnisflotte durchstreifen nun schon eine ganze Weile die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Nur Omnissiah weiß, was sie zu finden hoffen, aber ihre Akolythen tauchen regelmäßig auf besiedelten Welten auf und suchen heiliges Wissen, mechanische Relikte ... und Xeno-Artefakte, wenn man den Gerüchten glaubt. Angeblich wollen sie den unwissenden Pöble vor Verderbnis bewahren. Ein Techpriester namens Opticon-22 wickelt im Namen der Flotte die Geschäfte mit uns ab. Ihr findet ihn in den Docks von Footfall."

languages.text: « Ils appartiennent à la Flotte de la Connaissance des Explorators qui sillonne les Étendues de Koronus depuis un certain temps. L'Omnimessie seul sait ce que ces gens espèrent trouver, mais leurs acolytes visitent régulièrement les mondes habités en quête de savoir sacré, de reliques mécaniques... et de xéno-artefacts, pour dire la vérité. Tout cela pour préserver la populace ignorante de la corruption, à ce qu'ils affirment. Quoi qu'il en soit, nous traitons avec la flotte par l'entremise d'un technoprêtre des docks de Castel. Un certain Opticon-22. »
languages.original_text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Ils appartiennent à la Flotte de la Connaissance des Explorators qui sillonne les Étendues de Koronus depuis un certain temps. L'Omnimessie seul sait ce que ces gens espèrent trouver, mais leurs acolytes visitent régulièrement les mondes habités en quête de savoir sacré, de reliques mécaniques... et de xéno-artefacts, pour dire la vérité. Tout cela pour préserver la populace ignorante de la corruption, à ce qu'ils affirment. Quoi qu'il en soit, nous traitons avec la flotte par l'entremise d'un technoprêtre des docks de Castel. Un certain Opticon-22. »

languages.text: "Epey bir süredir Koronus Enginliği'nde dolaşan Keşiftör Malumat Filosu'ndan olur kendileri. Ne bulmayı umduklarını Hermesih bilir ama havarileri düzenli olarak meskûn dünyalarda ortaya çıkıp kutsal İrfan parçalarını arıyor ve mekanik yadigârların izini sürüyorlar... Bir yandan da zeno eserleri kovalıyorlar açıkçası. Güya cahil ayaktakımını yozlaşmadan kurtarmak niyetindeler. Bizimle Filo adına Opticon-22 adlı bir Tekno Rahip iş yapıyor. Kendisini Binliman'daki rıhtımda bulabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Members of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, which has been roaming the Koronus Expanse for a good while now. Omnissiah knows what they are hoping to find, but their acolytes regularly show up on inhabited worlds, seeking bits of sacred Knowledge, tracking down mechanical relics... and sniffing out xeno-artefacts, if truth be told. Supposedly, they want to save the ignorant rabble from corruption. A Tech-Priest named Opticon-22 does business with us on the Fleet's behalf. He can be found at the docks on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Epey bir süredir Koronus Enginliği'nde dolaşan Keşiftör Malumat Filosu'ndan olur kendileri. Ne bulmayı umduklarını Hermesih bilir ama havarileri düzenli olarak meskûn dünyalarda ortaya çıkıp kutsal İrfan parçalarını arıyor ve mekanik yadigârların izini sürüyorlar... Kendisini Binliman'daki rıhtımda bulabilirsiniz."
